reg_pit.title: Property Transfer Tax Exemption Regulation No. 20

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 68/2017, effective March 1, 2017.

reg:regulation.reg:title: Property Transfer Tax Exemption Regulation No. 20

bcl:section.bcl:text: Transfers to Y.F.N. Developments Inc., Inc. No. BC 0911364, of the property described below is exempt from tax payable under the Property Transfer Tax Act:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: Block C of District Lot 1895 and of Section 34 Township 6 Range 26 W6M and of Sections 2, 10, 11, 13 and 14 Township 7 Range 26 W6M Yale Division Yale District as shown on Plan EPP39668, PID 029-399-831.

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation is retroactive to September 18, 2014, with effect on and after that date.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Property Transfer Tax Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 378, section 37]
